Return & Refund Policy

Thanks for shopping at www.3des.ca

If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we're here to help.

Returns

Any claims for misprinted, damaged, defective items must be submitted within 5 days after the product has been received. For packages lost in transit, all claims must be submitted no later than 10 days after the estimated delivery date. Claims deemed an error on our part are covered at our own expense.

Because we provide custom made products we cannot provide returns for buyers remorse. We provide a digital preview of how the final product will look like and we might make minor modifications to better serve you with better finishing of the product. By approving the final draft of the design you agree to it, with full responsibility, before finalizing the order. If your order does not resemble (within a reasonable limit) the digital confirmation/final draft (at the time of checkout), then we will reprocess your order at no extra charge, provided that the original frames are returned to us (at our expense).   

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. Your item needs to have the receipt or proof of purchase.

If you notice an issue with your order, please submit an email to  info@3des.ca  with the subject line “Request Return for Order [your order number]”.

Reasons for Returns

Wrong Address - If you provide an address that is considered insufficient by the courier, the shipment will be returned to our facility. You will be liable for reshipment costs once we have confirmed an updated address with you. Unclaimed - Shipments that go unclaimed are returned to our facility and you will be liable for the cost of a reshipment.  

Exchanges

We do not offer exchanges on finished frames. We can offer exchanges on undesired frames if they are sent back to us unused and undamaged. Exchanges will be subject to a 25% restocking fee paid by the customer. Customers will be responsible for the cost of shipping items back to 3DES. Exchanges can only be made once the items are received and confirmed undamaged by 3DES.

Shipping

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are nonrefundable.

If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Cancellations

  We do not offer cancellations under any circumstances. All orders are made-to-order and the process begins immediately after an order is placed. If you have a question about a cancellation of an order please email us at info@3des.ca We will do our best to see if we can accommodate a cancellation request, but it is not guaranteed.

Contact Us

If you have any questions on how to return your item to us, contact us
